pr_title: WebFlux app can't start if management.server.port is customized

timeline.message: WebFlux app can't start if management.server.port is customized

timeline.bodyText: How about calling ensureValidPort(managementPort) so that an exception is raised if it's under 0?
timeline.author: minwoox

replies.bodyText: Also, how about returning early if managementPort is null?
replies.author: minwoox

timeline.bodyText: If armeriaWebServer is not null and the port is different, it seems like the previously configured settings to armeriaWebServer are gone. Isn't it right?
timeline.author: minwoox

replies.bodyText:
The previously configured settings remains.
I'll add some tests to check this.
replies.author: matsumana

timeline.bodyText:
How about leaving a comment?
The management port is set to the Server in ArmeriaSpringActuatorAutoConfiguration.
timeline.author: minwoox

timeline.message: Add the comment about the management port and ArmeriaSpringActuatorAutoConfiguration
